attributes.action: Make Charities pay a smaller wage to staff
attributes.background: Charities were set up to fund causes. Instead managers and executives are lining their pockets. Some charity staff are earning up to sixty thousand pounds a year. This money could've funded much needed research.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking Parliament to set a maximum salary for charity staff in law.
